ElementMousewheel_event.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The obsolete and non-standard mousewheel event is fired asynchronously at an to provide updates while a mouse wheel or similar device is operated. The mousewheel event was never part of any standard, and while it was implemented by several browsers, it was never implemented by Firefox.

blockquote.para: Note: Instead of this obsolete event, use the standard event.

remarks.para: -The standard event to listen to instead.
